name: hull PANIC
description:
Press 'H' to view the quick manual in game.

After falling out of the spaceship, agent 14 needs to make it back up. The nearby 'hull' laboratory can provide you with the items you need, but it is ridden with dangers.

Your 'Hull 3000' suit can help you survive, but all actions cost energy. Find the items you need to make it back to the spaceship.

This game will take you the first time about 20-30 minutes to finish.

Known bugs:

  • Dialogue might repeat in the intro once or twice (depends on clock speed of pc)
  • Rarely an enemy might push you into a wall. Use 'X' to self destruct and try again
  • Enemies might walk off screen (AI beats physics)

Future work:

  • The abandoned spaceship level, earth level and many other levels
  • A map
  • Weapons to defend yourself that will cost you energy too 
  • Much better enemies
  • Teleportation
  • A conspiracy story about a post-nuclear-space-race era

Credit:

  • PROGRAMMING + ART + MUSIC + VOICE: by Whelp
  • TESTING by Prismatronic

Resources:

  • Shader used is bktGlitch by Blokatt
  • Programmed in GMS2
  • Composed in Cubase9.5 (using u-hes Repro1,Repro5,Diva)
